channel.title: Sports Issue on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The 25 Greatest Sports Movies of All Time, Ranked
item.description: From ‘Hoop Dreams’ to ‘Bring It On,’ ‘Raging Bull’ to ‘Bull Durham’ and beyond, THR’s critics pick their all-time champs.

item.title: The 25 Greatest Sports Movies of All Time, Ranked
item.description: From ‘Hoop Dreams’ to ‘Bring It On,’ ‘Raging Bull’ to ‘Bull Durham’ and beyond, THR’s critics pick their all-time champs.

item.title: Lord of the Rings: Casey Wasserman’s Olympic Odyssey
item.description: Can the hard-driving Hollywood scion navigate political land mines, relentless fundraising and a showboating president to deliver Games glory to L.A.?

item.title: Lord of the Rings: Casey Wasserman’s Olympic Odyssey
item.description: Can the hard-driving Hollywood scion navigate political land mines, relentless fundraising and a showboating president to deliver Games glory to L.A.?

item.title: Glen Powell and Eli Manning: Meet Hollywood’s Most Unlikely ‘Powers’ Couple
item.description: What happens when a white-hot movie star and a champion quarterback team up for a risky football comedy with heart? Chad Powers happens. (Just don’t call it Hulu’s ‘Ted Lasso’!)
